info.name: PDF Auto Tagger
info.summary: Automatically categorizes and tags PDF files using a local Ollama instance.
info.description:
This app scans specified folders for untagged PDF files and uses a local Ollama instance to assign a relevant tag from a predefined list.
**Important:** This version sends the entire PDF file to Ollama and requires a multi-modal model (like LLaVA) that can understand document content.
info.author: George Soteriou
